slave.name: Sheep girl
slave.desc: A girl with the dna of sheep, the embodied sweetness.

slave.name: Goat girl
slave.desc: A temperamental girl, or just a tsundere ?

slave.name: Mare girl
slave.desc: Although she produces in small quantities, her milk is really good.

slave.name: Cow girl
slave.desc: Although she produces in huge quantities, her milk is just average.

slave.name: Bunny girl
slave.desc: She only think about making babies, beware of overcrowding.

slave.name: Sow girl
slave.desc: Although her hygienic habits are unattractive, she is a very clean girl.

slave.name: Bear girl
slave.desc: She seems a bit gruff but in reality she is a very sweet girl.

slave.name: Orca girl
slave.desc: An unfettered girl, you might need to swim to catch her.

slave.name: Cat girl
slave.desc: A cheerful girl which live for love, however somewhat lazy.

slave.name: Wolf girl
slave.desc: A tricky girl which live for hunting, however somewhat lonely.

slave.name: Reindeer girl
slave.desc: A party girl, you might need to run to catch her.

slave.name: Camel girl
slave.desc: A mysterious girl with strange hobbies, like counting the grains of sand in the desert.
